trans-unit.source: Controlling logging by using the log file

seg-source.mrk: Controlling logging by using the log file

target.mrk: Controlling logging by using the log file

trans-unit.source: The Network Server uses the <codeph>derby.log</codeph> file to log problems that it encounters. It also logs connections when the property <codeph>derby.drda.logConnections</codeph> is set to <codeph>true</codeph>.

seg-source.mrk: The Network Server uses the <codeph>derby.log</codeph> file to log problems that it encounters.
It also logs connections when the property <codeph>derby.drda.logConnections</codeph> is set to <codeph>true</codeph>.

target.mrk: The Network Server uses the <codeph>derby.log</codeph> file to log problems that it encounters.
It also logs connections when the property <codeph>derby.drda.logConnections</codeph> is set to <codeph>true</codeph>.

trans-unit.source: See <xref href="radminconfigdb2jdrdalogconnections.dita#radminconfigdb2jdrdalogconnections"></xref> for information on this property.

seg-source.mrk: See <xref href="radminconfigdb2jdrdalogconnections.dita#radminconfigdb2jdrdalogconnections"></xref> for information on this property.

target.mrk: See <xref href="radminconfigdb2jdrdalogconnections.dita#radminconfigdb2jdrdalogconnections"></xref> for information on this property.

trans-unit.source: The <codeph>derby.log</codeph> file is created when the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> server is started. The Network Server then records the time and version. If a log file exists, it is overwritten, unless the property <codeph>derby.infolog.append</codeph> is set to <codeph>true</codeph>.See "derby.infolog.append" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citref"></ph> for information on this property.

seg-source.mrk: The <codeph>derby.log</codeph> file is created when the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> server is started.
The Network Server then records the time and version.

If a log file exists, it is overwritten, unless the property <codeph>derby.infolog.append</codeph> is set to <codeph>true</codeph>.See "derby.infolog.append" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citref"></ph> for information on this property.

target.mrk: The <codeph>derby.log</codeph> file is created when the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> server is started.
The Network Server then records the time and version.

If a log file exists, it is overwritten, unless the property <codeph>derby.infolog.append</codeph> is set to <codeph>true</codeph>.See "derby.infolog.append" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citref"></ph> for information on this property.

trans-unit.source: When the Network Server is logging connections, it also logs the Connection Number; this log message is written both to the <codeph>derby.log</codeph> file and to the Network Server console.

seg-source.mrk: When the Network Server is logging connections, it also logs the Connection Number; this log message is written both to the <codeph>derby.log</codeph> file and to the Network Server console.

target.mrk: When the Network Server is logging connections, it also logs the Connection Number; this log message is written both to the <codeph>derby.log</codeph> file and to the Network Server console.
